summary: This module defines unit tests for the MONAI EnsembleEvaluator, including test cases and a helper class that supplies simple operations, data transformations, content verification utilities, and custom event handling to facilitate comprehensive testing of ensemble evaluation behavior.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and robustness of the ensemble evaluation component used in medical imaging AI workflows, ensuring that multiple models can be combined, events are managed properly, and outputs meet expected criteria.
